Key Match Events: Ryan Christie scored the opening goal after 58 minutes with an emphatic finish
Che Adams scored a spectacular volley five minutes from time
Pre-Game Insights: Steve Clarke's side struggled to find a breakthrough in the first half
The match was seen as a pre-season friendly due to the lack of competitive edge
Post-Match Reflections: Steve Clarke was critical of the performance, stating it was a tough watch
Liam Cooper limped off with an injury, adding to Scotland's injury concerns
Miscellaneous Highlights: Gibraltar's young striker James Scanlon made his debut
Scotland's win ended a seven-game winless run
Others: The match was Gibraltar's first win since November 2022
Gibraltar's ranking as the second worst in Europe was noted
